strapiPost.title: Weekend Roundup
strapiPost.content:
Happy Friday! Here is a rundown of some events and fun things happening this weekend...

  • Hog fam: Get hype at the Razorback Fan Fest this Saturday down in Little Rock as the Hogs take on UAPB!*
  • Outdoor market: Weekend farmer's markets are still in full swing and a must visit.
  • Pick up: Attend a community clean up event this weekend in Springdale or Rogers. Keep NWA beautiful!
  • Movie: Get in the Halloween spirit with a family movie day at Big Sexy Food in Springdale.
  • Shady: Pick up your free new tree or plant this Saturday in one of the many NWA communities.
  • Groovy: There is a free music and arts festival this Saturday at Prairie Street Live.
  • Green thumbs: Garden at Crystal Bridges on Saturday with a nature specialist.

Have a great weekend and we will see you Monday!
